entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Eskasoni
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:43 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 02:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow before morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then northeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the Atlantic coast before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the Atlantic coast early in the morning. Wind becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
